name: false-swipe
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.
short_effect: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: An attack that leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.emerald: An attack that leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A restrained attack that always leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.
